Title: Supply and Delivery of Refuse & Recycling Wheelie Bins and Containers
Description:
Supply and delivery of 140lt, 180lt,240lt & 360lt Wheelie Bins and 660lt, 1100lt and 1280lt Containers.  The wheelie bins must comply fully with all aspects with the BS EN 840-1:2012 Mobile Waste & Recycling Containers.  The Containers shall comply fully with all aspects with the BS EN 840 Mobile Waste & Recycling Containers.

If you would like the Invitiation to Tender then please email:
procurement@wyreforestdc.gov.uk.

The deadline for submissions is 2pm Monday 22nd June 2015

Title: YPO - 000551 Plastic Wheeled Bins Including Distribution/Collection Services
Description: This award is for the Supply of Plastic Wheeled Bins in compliance with standard EN840 and/or the collection or delivery of wheeled bins. Items include the supply of wheeled bins, delivery to customer depots, delivery to individual households, collection of redundant wheeled bins including recycling, provision of spare parts, provision of leaflets, address labels, RFID tags and road shows where required.
Additional Text: YPO is purchasing on behalf other Contracting Authorities, please see the following link for a list of authorities: http://www.ypo.co.uk/customers/ojeu-permissible-users.aspx
